title: Create project proposal
content:
prompt = (
    "Create a project proposal document for 'Mobile App Development':

"
    "Title: Mobile App Development Proposal

"
    "1. Executive Summary:
"
    "   Project to build a task management mobile app
"
    "   Timeline: 12 weeks, Budget: $120K

"
    "2. Project Overview:
"
    "   - Native iOS and Android app
"
    "   - Key features: Task lists, reminders, team collaboration
"
    "   - Target users: Small business teams

"
    "3. Scope of Work:
"
    "   - Requirements gathering (Week 1-2)
"
    "   - Design and prototyping (Week 3-4)
"
    "   - Development (Week 5-10)
"
    "   - Testing and launch (Week 11-12)

"
    "4. Team:
"
    "   - 2 developers, 1 designer, 1 project manager

"
    "5. Budget Breakdown:
"
    "   - Development: $80K
"
    "   - Design: $25K
"
    "   - Testing: $10K
"
    "   - Contingency: $5K

"
    "6. Success Metrics:
"
    "   - 1000 users in first month
"
    "   - 4.5+ star rating
"
    "   - 70% user retention

"
    "Save as 'mobile_app_proposal.docx'"
)

response = document_agent.run(prompt)
print(response.content)
